availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas S. Bryan (Louisville, Kentucky, banker and representative (CSA))

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, banker and Provisional Council Member. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Jane Venable in Christian County, Kentucky on October 17, 1844. Father of George, John, Lucy, and Thomas Bryan. Sheriff in Christian County, Kentucky in 1850. Banker in Christian County in 1860. Member of the legislative body, the Council of Ten, of Kentucky's Confederate Provisional Government.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian, District 2, p. 426B

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian, Hopkinsville, p. 416A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, 000465562, p. 76.
